markdownRemark.html: The only school in Malaga authorized by the Junta de Andalucía as bilingual in English in Kindergarten, Primary, Secondary and in the three High School modes. They combine this with Chinese learning (from 3 years), German (from 1 Primary), French (optional from 1 ESO) and Russian (extracurricular).

frontmatter.title: MIT School Malaga
frontmatter.description: MIT School Malaga  - The only school in Malaga authorized by the Junta de Andalucía as bilingual in English in Kindergarten, Primary, Secondary and in the three High School modes. They combine this with Chinese learning (from 3 years), German (from 1 Primary), French (optional from 1 ESO) and Russian (extracurricular).
